title: Work - forces that do work on a system

content.description: A block is set on a table, where there is negligible friction between the block and the table. The block is connected to an identical hanging block by a string that passes over a pulley as shown. When the blocks are released from rest, the two-block system gains kinetic energy because work is done on the system.
content.question: Which type of force or forces make a nonzero contribution to the net work done on the two-block system?

choices.label: Gravitational force and normal force only
Gravitational force, tension, and normal force

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
